FuncDef: This command controls the creation of log events related tolocal-monitoring-policerstatus and activity.

ParaDef.Info: Sends the same events as just "log-events" plus DcpLocMonExcd, DcpLocMonExcdAllDynAlloc, and DcpLocMonExcdAllDynFreed. The optional "verbose" includes some events that are more likely used during debug/tuning/investigations.
